resources.string: Enter the number of the most common words you want to practice with. There are %1$d words.
Hey! Trying to crash the app? \n I told you there are just %1$d words.
Persistent one, are you? I can do this all day.
You do not see your mistake, do you? \n Perhaps get a math app first.
You want to practice with 0 words? \n Am I a joke to you?
